snippet: European soccer’s governing body, UEFA, called for a quick decision in the case of its suspended president, Michel Platini, and said the FIFA presidential election, in which he is a candidate, should take place in February as planned.
abstract: UEFA asks that president Michel Platini's 90-day suspension by FIFA be resolved quickly and that election for FIFA president be held as planned; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: European soccer’s governing body, UEFA, called for a quick decision in the case of its suspended president, Michel Platini, and said the FIFA presidential election, in which he is a candidate, should take place in February as planned.
